DOMAIN.NAME: Domain
DOMAIN.DESCRIPTION: Choose the domain that you are creating the ruleset for

NAME.NAME: Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: Add a unique name for the ruleset

OUTCOME.NAME: Outcome
OUTCOME.DESCRIPTION: Choose the outcome of the ruleset

RESTRICTION.NAME: Restriction
RESTRICTION.DESCRIPTION: Choose the restriction for the auto-restriction outcome

BETWEEN.RANGEWARN: The value for range end must be less than or equal to the value for range start

UPDATE.SUCCESS: Successfully updated the rule on this auto-restriction ruleset
UPDATE.ERROR: Failed to update the rule on this auto-restriction ruleset

ADD.SUCCESS: Successfully added the rule on this auto-restriction ruleset
ADD.ERROR: Failed to add the rule on this auto-restriction ruleset

OPERATOR.NAME: Operator
OPERATOR.DESCRIPTION: The operator to be used against the filter field value

LIST.TITLE: Auto-Restriction Rulesets
LIST.DESCRIPTION: A searchable list of auto-restriction rulesets

ADD.TITLE: Add an Auto-Restriction Ruleset
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Use the controls below to setup an auto-restriction ruleset
ADD.ERROR: Failed to add the auto-restriction ruleset

DISABLE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to disable this auto-restriction ruleset?

ENABLE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to enable this auto-restriction ruleset?

DELETE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this auto-restriction ruleset?

DELETERULE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this auto-restriction ruleset rule?
DELETERULE.SUCCESS: Successfully deleted the auto-restriction ruleset rule

CHANGENAME.TITLE: Auto Restriction Rulesets Change Name
CHANGENAME.SUCCESS: Successfully changed the auto-restriction ruleset name
CHANGENAME.ERROR: Failed to change the auto-restriction ruleset name

CHANGEOUTCOME.TITLE: Auto Restriction Rulesets Change Outcome
CHANGEOUTCOME.SUCCESS: Successfully changed the auto-restriction ruleset outcome
CHANGEOUTCOME.ERROR: Failed to change the auto-restriction ruleset outcome

CHANGERESTRICTION.TITLE: Auto Restriction Rulesets Change Restriction
CHANGERESTRICTION.SUCCESS: Successfully changed the auto-restriction ruleset restriction
CHANGERESTRICTION.ERROR: Failed to change the auto-restriction ruleset restriction
